cdWebAppName.defaultValue: Name of a CD App Service

metadata.description: Name of your Log Analytics Workspace
Resource Group Log Analytics exists is

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
traces
| where timestamp > ago(1h)
| where message contains "ERROR"
| where (customDimensions).Role contains "CD"
| project timestamp, message, (customDimensions).InstanceName
| order by timestamp desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
traces
| where timestamp > ago(1h)
| where message contains "ERROR"
| where (customDimensions).Role contains "CM"
| project timestamp, message, (customDimensions).InstanceName
| order by timestamp desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
traces
| where timestamp > ago(24h)
| extend localTime = timestamp + 1h
| where message contains "ERROR"
| where message !contains "INFO" and message !contains "WARN" and message !contains "Could not update device detection" 
| project localTime, message, (customDimensions).InstanceName
| order by localTime desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
pageViews
| where timestamp > ago(14d)
| summarize TotalUniqueSessions = dcount(session_Id) by bin(timestamp, 1d)
| order by timestamp asc
| render barchart kind=default

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
traces
| where timestamp > ago(1d)
| where message contains "certificate"

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
traces
| where timestamp > ago(72h)
| where message contains "ERROR"
| where (customDimensions).Role contains "CD"
| extend localTime = timestamp + 1h
| summarize Amount_Of_Errors=dcount(message) by bin(localTime, 1h)
| order by localTime asc
| render timechart

content.Query:
traces
| where timestamp > ago(144h)
| where message contains "ERROR"
| where (customDimensions).Role contains "CD"
| extend localTime = timestamp + 1h
| summarize Amount_Of_Errors=dcount(message) by bin(localTime, 1h)
| order by localTime asc
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
traces
| where timestamp > ago(144h)
| where message contains "ERROR"
| where (customDimensions).Role contains "CM"
| extend localTime = timestamp + 1h
| summarize Amount_Of_Errors=dcount(message) by bin(localTime, 1h)
| order by localTime asc
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
traces
| where timestamp > ago(144h)
| where message !contains "INFO" and message !contains "WARN" and message !contains "Could not update device detection" 
| extend localTime = timestamp + 1h
| summarize Amount_Of_Errors=dcount(message) by bin(localTime, 1h)
| order by localTime asc
| render timechart

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value: traces | where message contains "license" and severityLevel > 1

content.Query:
traces
| where timestamp > ago(14d)
| where message contains "license" and severityLevel > 1

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
exceptions
| where timestamp > ago(14d)
| extend localTime = timestamp + 1h
| project localTime, (customDimensions).MachineName, assembly, outerMessage

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
requests
| where timestamp > ago(1d)
//| where resultCode == "404"
| summarize count() by url
| order by count_ desc | project url, count_

content.Query:
requests
| where timestamp > ago(14d)
| summarize count() by url
| order by count_ desc | project url, count_

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
requests
| where timestamp > ago(14d)
| extend localTime = timestamp + 1h
| where resultCode == "404"
| order by localTime desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
requests
| where timestamp > ago(14d)
| where resultCode == "404"
| summarize count() by url
| order by count_ desc | project url, count_
